items.headline: How to tariff-proof your holiday shopping list
items.summary_en: This year, the strategy for savvy holiday shoppers is not just finding a discount, but entirely avoiding the tariff burden by focusing on U.S.-made gifts, imported products with low tariff rates, gift cards and experiences.
